getSendStatus().Description: Returns the send status of the just-sent SMS.

Parameters: int: send status, one of @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_OK_E@, @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_RETRY_ON_CARRIER_NETWORK_E@, and @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_ERROR_E@.
int: message reference of the just-sent SMS. This field is applicable only if send status is @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_OK_E@.
CarrierMessagingService.SendSmsResult(in.Description: Constructs a SendSmsResult with the send status and message reference for the just-sent SMS.

Parameters: int: send status, one of @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_OK_E@, @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_RETRY_ON_CARRIER_NETWORK_E@, and @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_ERROR_E@.
int: message reference of the just-sent SMS. This field is applicable only if send status is @B_android#service#carrier#CarrierMessagingService#SEND_STATUS_OK_E@.
CarrierMessagingService.SendSmsResult(in.Description: Constructs a SendSmsResult with the send status and message reference for the just-sent SMS.

getMessageRef().Description: Returns the message reference of the just-sent SMS.

ClassDesc: The result of sending an SMS.
